description:
For some reason this snap can't read my system's timezone info, so times are only shown in GMT. Asana doesn't provide an option to set your own offset in the app, so you're stuck.

I went back to using the browser version as a result.

I'm on Pop!_os, so if you're on Ubuntu this may be worth a try still. Besides the timezone issue, this is well done.
summary: Time zone issues make for flawed experience

description: Zenkit base does something similar for free, but the premium features like Portfolios and Workload are unique that could be worth the price. Simple yet elegant look and feel.
